root: ^Thanks for your help with my homework!
^Oh yeah, I promised to tell you what I heard.
^Well, there's this guy who lives down that weird path who HATES bees. I overheard him shouting the other day.
^"Damn you bee! Bee is the worst! Oh bee..." he was saying!

c-0: ^Yeah! Maybe was so angry that he forgot to say bees instead of bee. Or maybe there was just one bee that he was really upset at!
^But I know what I heard. I may not be good at maths, but I have a perfect memory!
c-1: ^Right! It has to be him. But he saw me listening to him shouting and made me promise not to tell anyone so...
^Don't tell anyone! Or he might turn me into a frog. Yuck!
